ns0:entry.ns0:title: BerriAI/litellm
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm
Language: python
Python SDK, Proxy Server (LLM Gateway) to call 100+ LLM APIs in OpenAI format - [Bedrock, Azure, OpenAI, VertexAI, Cohere, Anthropic, Sagemaker, HuggingFace, Replicate, Groq]

ns0:entry.ns0:title: NVIDIA-NeMo/NeMo
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/NVIDIA-NeMo/NeMo
Language: python
A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: ansible/ansible
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/ansible/ansible
Language: python
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your applications and systems easier to deploy and maintain. Automate everything from code deployment to network configuration to cloud management, in a language that approaches plain English, using SSH, with no agents to install on remote systems. https://docs.ansible.com.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: crewAIInc/crewAI
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/crewAIInc/crewAI
Language: python
Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, CrewAI empowers agents to work together seamlessly, tackling complex tasks.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: eriklindernoren/ML-From-Scratch
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/eriklindernoren/ML-From-Scratch
Language: python
Machine Learning From Scratch. Bare bones NumPy implementations of machine learning models and algorithms with a focus on accessibility. Aims to cover everything from linear regression to deep learning.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: getsentry/sentry
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/getsentry/sentry
Language: python
Developer-first error tracking and performance monitoring

The fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
